--- In gladiator@y..., "dancing corpse" <dancing_corpse@h...> wrote:
> good god of death vs evel god? lets see...
> Norse miths would have Hela Vs. Loki
> Greek: Hades Vs. one of the Titens
> I guess you could even do God Vs. the Devel only the problem with 
this is 
> the Devel you better fit the god of the dead.
> there could also be Roman, Hindu, Celtic or one of the panthenons of 
D&D 
> which i don't know off the top of my head.
> probably the best bet would be to make one up, though.

I settled on "Sun Bai" as the god of the Dead, but "Subian" does not 
seem like a good name for the opponent.

As for the title "Battle of the Gods", the archmage who created 
Extreme Island is so powerfull that he has god-like strength.  I just 
hope everyone enjoys the spooky ending.
